caption:
This is a vibrant and colorful photograph showcasing a forest during the autumn season. The landscape is predominantly covered with trees that display a rich array of fall colors, including reds, oranges, and yellows, mixed with patches of green. 

In the background, there are two prominent hills or low mountains which rise above the foliage. The hill on the left side of the image is mostly covered in evergreen trees that maintain a dark green hue, contrasting with the bright autumn colors of the deciduous trees at its base. The hill on the right expands further into the distance and features a blend of both evergreen and deciduous trees, similarly showing a mix of green and vivid autumn colors.

The sky above the hills is a clear blue, adding a calm backdrop to the colorful forest scene below. The overall composition captures the essence of fall in a temperate deciduous forest, emphasizing the seasonal change and natural beauty of this landscape.
title: Hardwood fall color on the lower slopes at 2,000 feet or higher include red and sugar maples, beech and yellow birch. Coniferous cover on slopes at 3,000 feet and above include balsam fir and some paper birch. View shows the flanks of
